titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to establish an Office of Rural Investment, to ensure that rural communities and regions are equitably represented in Federal decision making for transportation policy, and for other purposes.
Rural Transportation Equity Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Rural Transportation Equity Act of 2021
This bill establishes within the Department of Transportation (DOT) the Office of Rural Investment to ensure that rural transportation needs are addressed and prioritized in DOT policies, programs, and activities. The bill also establishes a rural transportation advisory council to consult with and advise the office.
